Chinese: <object1>是否在图像中<object2>的左侧？
<object1>是否在图像中<object2>的右侧？
<object1>是否在图像中<object2>的上方？
<object1>是否在图像中<object2>的下方？
<object1>是否在图像中<object2>的前面？
<object1>是否在图像中<object2>的后面？
<object1>是否在图像中<object2>的内部？
<object1>是否在图像中<object2>的外部？
图像中<object2>中间部位是否有<object1>？
English: Is the <object1> on the left of the <object2> in the image?
Is the <object1> on the right of the <object2> in the image?
Is the <object1> on the top of the <object2> in the image?
Is the <object1> under of the <object2> in the image?
Is the <object1> in front of the <object2> in the image?
Is the <object1> behind the <object2> in the image?
Is the <object1> inside the <object2> in the image?
Is the <object1> outside the <object2> in the image?
Is there <object1> in the middle of <object2> in the image?

图像中<object1>在<object2>的什么方位？
English: What is on the left side of <object2> in the image?
What is on the right side of <object2> in the image?
What is on the top of <object2> in the image?
What is under <object2> in the image?
What is in front of <object2> in the image?
What is behind <object2> in the image?

What is outside <object2> in the image?
